title: Contaminated Midday Meals in Local Government School
description: Students at Government School #14 in Vastral, Ahmedabad, reported nausea and vomiting after consuming the midday meal. Several parents have raised concerns about food safety and hygiene. The incident highlights a recurring issue with quality checks in school food supply chains.

name: Safe Plate Foundation
about: We advocate for safe and nutritious meals in government-run schools. Our mission is to ensure every child receives hygienic, high-quality food through inspections, digital reporting tools, and parent-teacher-community audits.

title: Midday Meal Inspection & Awareness Drive at Govt School #14
description: Join Safe Plate Foundation for a collaborative inspection drive of the midday meal program at Government School #14. Volunteers will assist experts in hygiene assessment, parent feedback collection, and student health surveys. Data will be submitted to district authorities for immediate action.
